game.name: Stolen Dolls
game.shortDescription: 도난당한 인형은 무기를 가진 주인공이 장애물을 극복하고 숲 생물 싸움,그녀의 장난감을 수집해야하는 흥미 진진한 2 차원 플랫폼 게임이다. 어려운 레벨을 해결하고 함정을 피하고 컬렉션을 복원하십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Help the girl with the gun collect all her dolls while overcoming dangers in the forest. Enemies will try to stop you at every turn — be careful, avoid traps, and collect as many dolls as possible across all levels.

reviewHighlights.text: Surprisingly fun little platformer! Stolen Dolls has that old-school 2D charm — simple but challenging. The levels get tricky fast, and every jump fee...
If you've ever wished you had a gun while playing Mario, this game makes that dream come true. Finally, you can not only run away or jump over annoyin...
